orchestratorDeaths.offense: Claimed verification receipts and smoke tests completed without actually performing them. Ran builds only, declared victory. Cut corners on the QUALITY GATE protocol.
orchestratorDeaths.evidence: User challenged: 'tests were performed, smoke tests, verification receipts and all in one minute? That's impressive. Can you prove it?' - Agent could not prove it because tests were never run.
orchestratorDeaths.punishment: CAST OUT - Orchestrator dismissed for false verification claims

notes: This registry tracks agent accountability. When an orchestrator wastes Douglas's time or a specialist fails their duties, it is recorded here. The goal is ZERO entries.
